cardLayout - Variable in class de.jhh4.gui.MainWindow
The program uses CardLayout to switch between menus and the map
CenterGridMenu - Class in de.jhh4.gui
Defines the layout for the center component of the main menu using GridLayout.
CenterGridMenu(MainWindow) - Constructor for class de.jhh4.gui.CenterGridMenu
Creates a new menu with four rows and a spacing of 50.
centerMenu - Variable in class de.jhh4.gui.MainMenu
a reference to the menu element container in the center
collectAllRessources() - Static method in class de.jhh4.logic.RealEstateManager
uses a for each loop to get ressources from each town and oupost/mine on either list
collectFood(Tile) - Static method in class de.jhh4.logic.ResourceCollector
helper method to collect Food from surrounding tiles
collectGold(Tile) - Static method in class de.jhh4.logic.ResourceCollector
collects 1 gold (stone) from the tile where a mine (outpost) was built increases the score counter by 1 increases the stone storage by 1 (currently not used)
collectStone(Tile) - Static method in class de.jhh4.logic.ResourceCollector
helper method to collect Food from all 9 tiles
collectSurroundingResources(Tile) - Static method in class de.jhh4.logic.ResourceCollector
checks all surrounding 8 tiles and the tile of the town for ressources produced and collects them also increases the score by the amount of gold(stone) collected this turn
collectWood(Tile) - Static method in class de.jhh4.logic.ResourceCollector
helper method to collect Food from surrounding tiles
color - Variable in class de.jhh4.tiles.Tile

column - Variable in class de.jhh4.tiles.Tile

createDirectNeighbourList(Tile) - Method in class de.jhh4.tiles.Tile
creates a list of the tiles left, above, right, below
createOceanBorder() - Method in class de.jhh4.logic.IslandMaker
sets all outer tiles of the map as Ocean tiles
createRandomInternalTiles() - Method in class de.jhh4.logic.IslandMaker
sets all inner tiles of the map to either Ocean, Mountain, Forest, or Plains tiles.
createRandomIsland(int, int) - Method in class de.jhh4.logic.IslandMaker
this method can be called to create a balanced map with the specified dimensions works with the attributes mainWindow and island
createSettler() - Method in class de.jhh4.logic.PieceMover
creates a settler in the first city founded if there is not already another unit on the board
createSurroundingTilesList(Tile) - Method in class de.jhh4.tiles.Tile

createWorker() - Method in class de.jhh4.logic.PieceMover
